name: End-to-end shopping on SauceDemo site
statusMessage:
Given I launch the SauceDemo site
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.GivenILaunchTheSauceDemoSite() (2.3s)
Then I validate the login page elements
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIValidateTheLoginPageElements() (0.1s)
When I try logging in with invalid credentials
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenITryLoggingInWithInvalidCredentials() (0.3s)
Then I should see an error message
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIShouldSeeAnErrorMessage() (0.0s)
When I log in with valid credentials
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenILogInWithValidCredentials() (0.2s)
And I sort products by "Price (low to high)"
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenISortProductsBy("Price (low to high)") (0.1s)
And I add two items to the cart
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenIAddTwoItemsToTheCart() (0.1s)
Then I verify the cart badge count is 2
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIVerifyTheCartBadgeCountIs(2) (0.0s)
When I go to the cart page
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenIGoToTheCartPage() (0.0s)
Then I verify both items are listed
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIVerifyBothItemsAreListed() (0.0s)
When I remove one item from the cart
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenIRemoveOneItemFromTheCart() (0.0s)
Then I verify the item is removed
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIVerifyTheItemIsRemoved() (0.0s)
When I proceed to checkout and fill in personal details
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenIProceedToCheckoutAndFillInPersonalDetails() (0.4s)
Then I verify the order summary and finish the purchase
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIVerifyTheOrderSummaryAndFinishThePurchase() (0.2s)
And I should see the confirmation message
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIShouldSeeTheConfirmationMessage() (0.0s)
When I click back to products
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.WhenIClickBackToProducts() (0.0s)
Then I should land on the products page
-> done: SauceDemoSteps.ThenIShouldLandOnTheProductsPage() (0.0s)

steps.name: Given  I launch the SauceDemo site
Then  I validate the login page elements
When  I try logging in with invalid credentials
Then  I should see an error message
When  I log in with valid credentials
And  I sort products by "Price (low to high)"
And  I add two items to the cart
Then  I verify the cart badge count is 2
When  I go to the cart page
Then  I verify both items are listed
When  I remove one item from the cart
Then  I verify the item is removed
When  I proceed to checkout and fill in personal details
Then  I verify the order summary and finish the purchase
And  I should see the confirmation message
When  I click back to products
Then  I should land on the products page
